Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.Dict.anyString(Iterable)
    use Dict.some(java.lang.Iterable) instead
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.Dict.anyString(Locale...)
    use Dict.some(java.util.Locale...) instead
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.TodUtils.checkNotDirtyUrl(String, Object)
    Moved to Preconditions.checkNotDirtyUrl(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object) @ param url the URL to check
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.TodUtils.checkNotEmpty(Collection, Object)
    Moved to Preconditions.checkNotEmpty(java.lang.Iterable, java.lang.Object)
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.TodUtils.checkNotEmpty(String, Object)
    Moved to Preconditions.checkNotEmpty(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object) @ param prependedErrorMessage the exception message to use if the check fails; will be converted to a string using String.valueOf(Object) and prepended to more specific error messages.
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.LocalizedString.getLocale()
    use {#loc()} instead. (This one is kept for java bean compatibility)
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.ALocalizedString.getLocale()
    use {#loc()} instead. (This one is kept for java bean compatibility)
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.LocalizedString.getString()
    use {#str()} instead. (This one is kept for java bean compatibility)
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.ALocalizedString.getString()
    use {#str()} instead. (This one is kept for java bean compatibility)
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.TodUtils.parseIso8061(String)
    experimental, try to avoid using it for now
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.TodUtils.parseNumericalId(String, String)
    this shouldn't be here.....
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.Dict.string(Locale)
    use instead
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.Dict.strings(Locale)
    use instead
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.LocalizedString.withLocale(Locale)
    eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.LocalizedString.withString(String)
